Jimmy Greaves is reportedly set to be given an MBE when the New Year's honours list is announced in the coming days.

articles.title: Lewis Hamilton calls for school children to be taught about black history - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton lost his grandfather Davidson in 2018 and today said he 'never learnt where my family were from'. Davidson brought the family over from Grenada to Britain in 1955.
